name: Space Fighter (itch) (George Pagkalis)
description:
HOW MUCH DO YOU  LOVE RAPID FIRING,
EXPLOSIONS AND SPACESHIPS?

This Asteroids clone will get your blood pumping and your nerves wracking! Countless enemies, difficult bosses and annoying meteors await you!  Get ready to perform quick maneuvers, collect power-ups and experience unlimited frustration in this  highly enjoyable space adventure!
